attributes.action: Have a people's vote on all MP's to remove all who have ignored the leave vote.
attributes.additional_details: If we don't work as our employers ask we lose our jobs and that's exactly what should happen here with MP's doing what they want not what the majority voted for so British people should get a vote as they have ignored democracy and should no longer have a place in parliament.
attributes.background: Due to the mess so many MP's have created regarding Brexit on the hope of keeping Britain tied to the dictating EU and ignoring the democratic vote of the British people we should get a vote on which MP's can continue representing no matter which parties.Why should we allow them to continue role?

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. MPs are elected by their constituents.
